CustomField.description:
Audience selection rule
Example: "Campaign.Geo__c == 'US' && Campaign.ShowReadOnlyCampaignATPPage__c == 'true' && Campaign.IsIncentive__c == 'true' && Campaign.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Partner'"
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Audience selection rule
Example: "Campaign.Geo__c == 'US' && Campaign.ShowReadOnlyCampaignATPPage__c == 'true' && Campaign.IsIncentive__c == 'true' && Campaign.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Partner'"
CustomField.label: Audience Rule
